document.full_text: dirk nowitzki scored 24 points, shawn marion added 14 and the dallas mavericks stunned the erratic los angeles lakers 93-81 in game 2 on wednesday ...
document.title: nowitzki, barea help send mavs to 2-0 lead over lakers
